title: Question about downgrade with oem locked
content:
I owned a Pixel 3 (Verizon version) and it's up-to-date, but then I found it will froze sometimes, and automatically reboot,  I tried to reset to factory settings  and flash the newest OTA image through adb sideload , but it still happens. 
I know that verizon version bootloader are locked, but I still want to know is there any possible that technicians from Google can help me unlock bootloader, which allows me to flash factory firmware to solve this problem.
